main event: A low, irregular, triangular, flashing red light was observed moving swiftly and silently, disappearing into the haze.
interesting points: The object appeared about 1-2 degrees above the horizon and moved quite definitely.
Another report mentioned a flat and circular object with unusual features like holes around the lip, flashing in sunlight at about 25 degrees elevation.
The object moved back and forth, ascending and descending, but did not hover.
The object was sighted on three consecutive nights for about 3 hours each time.
Ground visual and telescope observations were made of the object.
sighted object: A low, irregular, triangular, flashing red light; a flat and circular object with holes around the lip
